snippet.title: Aeon Wars  - Nesuv Empire Story Teaser
snippet.description:
"It is the year 2411 and what will later be known as the 3rd Aeon Wars has erupted on Leng, a colonised moon 14 light years away from Earth. The radical Arkosys, bent on eliminating humans from Leng, just launched their all-out assault on the Guttenberg, capital of the Nesuv Empire. But Nesuv does not bow to machines, not now, not ever!" 

Aeon Wars is a turn based strategy wargame set in the Maschinen Crisis universe.
https://aeonwarsgame.com/

Come to our Discord to get insider updates on the project.
https://discord.gg/SgN2Ub9k

We are Soliton, an independent game studio based in Montreal. We are bringing the world of miniature gaming to the metaverse.
https://solitoninteractive.com/
